DOC.detailed_description: The Moderate Preterm Registry registry moderate preterm infant ( 29-33 week gestational age ) bear alive NICHD Neonatal Research Network ( NRN ) center . The purpose collect baseline outcome data uniform manner cohort infant . The registry collect observational baseline data mother infant , therapy use outcomes infant . The information collect specific disease treatment ( i.e. , `` generic '' ) . Baseline data collect soon admission NICU ; outcome data collect time death discharge hospital . The data collect include information : - Demographics mother infant - Mother 's health ( e.g. , pregnancy history complication ) - Labor deliver ( e.g. , rupture membrane , steroid antibiotic give , mode delivery ) - Infant 's health ( gestational age , Apgar score , weight , length , delivery room resuscitation , respiratory support , etc . ) - Infant 's medical outcome ( heart , lung , nervous system , gastrointestinal system , hearing , vision , know infection , major malformations/syndromes , mortality number day hospitalize ) . These data use : examine association baseline characteristic , treatment , outcome ; track trend incidence disease effectiveness therapy ; identify question require additional in-depth research . Informed Consent : As require local IRBs .
